code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useGetUserID}from'../hooks/useGetUserID.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const SavedRecipes=()=>{const[savedRecipes,setSavedRecipes]=useState([]);const userID=useGetUserID();useEffect(()=>{const fetchSavedRecipe=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/recipes/savedRecipes/".concat(userID));setSavedRecipes(response.data.savedRecipes);}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchSavedRecipe();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"recipes-home-title",children:" Saved Recipes "}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:savedRecipes.map(recipe=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:recipe.name})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ingredients",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:recipe.ingredients+","})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"instructions",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:recipe.instructions}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:recipe.imageUrl,alt:recipe.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[" Cooking Time: ",recipe.cookingTime," minutes "]})]})]},recipe._id))})]});};
